I purchased two of these scarves. They are beautiful and the size allows for several different ways to wear them.  The colors are vivid and true to the photos on the website.  I have purchased three more of these scarves in different colors and patterns.

I ordered style C-14. The colors match perfectly to what my phone showed. The quality of the silk is wonderful, especially for the price. I have ordered other 100% mulberry silk items previously, from different sources, and this is by far the best quality and size I have received. There are no snags or pulls, and the edge hems are flawless. I can't imagine sewing this well with such a silky fabric, but this scarf is so well done. I would be proud to present it to anyone as a gift- it rely does look like a much more expensive piece. It wraps my neck twice, and tucks in to create a lovely, loose drape that is so flattering! It also works beautifully as a light shawl for coolish summer evenings. It is too much fabric to use as the type of head wrap I was thinking about, but if you wear it as a head scarf/neck wrap, as worn by women for various cultural reasons, it would be the perfect size. I highly recommend this particular style/print, and am going to be ordering several other styles - for myself and as gifts.
Love how soft the scarf felt against my skin. Ample size. Interesting design.
Very good scarf, the best of the three I ordered. Worth waiting for.

I was hesitate after reading those comments that the scarf is not real silk. Got the scarf today, I'm pretty sure it is silk. I'm very picky about silk or not, but this one is real. Very beautiful design, good quality of work, very comfortable wearing it. I may get another one for different color match.

评论概述: Really nice scarf- more beautiful than expected
评论详情: I purchased this scarf in the black floral. As another review stated, the edge color is a soft pink with a lavender undertone. The scarf truly feels like silk to me, and I wear a lot of silk clothing. It was soft and draped beautifully. The size was perfect for use as a shawl over a sleeveless dress for evening wear. It was folded into a small square for shipping, but all it took was a warm iron to press beautifully. I folded it into thirds lengthwise and rolled it onto a paper towel core for a trip by air . It arrived with almost zero wrinkles. I certainly will purchase additional colors -its that beautiful !

评论概述: This is not silk, buyer beware
评论详情: This scarf feels extremely slippery and does not drape well at all.  I own many, many real silk scarves and this is not made of silk but of a 'silk-like' material.  I do not appreciate false advertising.  Even the label on the scarf does not indicate it is made of 'silk'; it only has the three letter initial of the company name.  I know not to order from this company anymore.  I had bought another orange scarf from this company as well and it too is made of 'silk-like' material.  The very cheap price should have cautioned me not to think that I could get my hands on a quality silk scarf for a cheap price.  You get what you pay for.
